name: Breakout (In Java)
description:
This was a project I made for my tech class. (I was able to get a 31/32 for the project --  it had one bug in it, but I didn't know how to fix it)

I made this game with Eclipse; it was hard and I honestly do not plan on using it for my future games.

If there are any bugs in it, I'm sorry, but I cannot fix them; I don't have the project file anymore. Even if I did, it would be very difficult for me to fix them.

Note: You need to install Java to play this game.

Download Java for Windows
